author: D. Peter Boucher, Kt. SMOM, International Master Mariner
content:
The first thing that occurred to me was UNSTABLE. Furthermore after the video this was reinforced. It might have worked for barges in a sheltered river. As to using it in Nantucket the combined unit would have capsized being top-heavy. The twin units connected by chains worked, it seems, remarkably well.

Good Watch
